name: Mecha Kucha Gacha Defence
description:
Mecha Kucha Gacha Defense is a pixel gacha defense game.

You will play a defense game where enemies are swarming.
You can upgrade various functions with the star you get while playing the game,
Or you can just pay(free) for more gacha.
You can also take risks and undergo terrifying ordeals in order to obtain stars.

But whatever it is, if your overwhelming 'luck', then your path is the right one.

⁙Only easy English was used in the game.
To exaggerate, you can play the game without knowing any language.
